### Hi there, I'm Gersigno 👋

👔 <i>Self-taugh</i><b> Software-Engineer</b> and <b>Fullstack developer</b>.<br>
🧩 <b>Cyber-security</b> & <b>computer science</b> enthusiast.<br>
💕 Love <b>UI/UX design</b>.<br>
🧸 Basic knowledge of <b>C</b>, <b>C++</b>, <b>game hacking</b>, <b>reverse engineering</b>, <b>OSINT</b>...

# ✨ About
> 🌍 I can easily <b><i>speak and write</i></b> <b>French</b> and <b>English</b> !
